verses.roman:
tathāpi āmāra ājñā ya śraddhā yadi haya
āmāra ei vākye tabe kariha niścaya

synonyms: tathāpi—still; āmāra ājñā ya—in My instruction; śraddhā—faith; yadi—if; haya—there is; āmāra—My; ei—these; vākye—by words; tabe—then; kariha niścaya—you can ascertain.
translation: "Nevertheless, if you want to take instructions from Me with faith and love, you may ascertain your duties from the following words.
